sentences.english: The gel would probably be injected after the scar tissue has been surgically removed.
sentences.chinese: 这种凝胶可能会在手术摘除疤痕组织后注射。

sentences.english: There was a big and obvious scar on his left-side neck.
sentences.chinese: 他的左颈上有一道明显的长长的疤痕。

sentences.english: A jagged scar runs down his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 他的额头上交织着累累疤痕。

sentences.english: Can vitamin E capsule treat the scar of wet poison?
sentences.chinese: 维生素E胶囊可以治疗湿毒的疤痕吗？

sentences.english: Why, Discher wondered, don't heart muscle cells then replace the scar tissue?
sentences.chinese: 迪斯凯尔想知道，为什么心肌细胞不取代疤痕组织呢？

sentences.english: The scar developed while Joaquin was in his mother’s stomach.
sentences.chinese: 杰昆在他妈妈的肚子里时就有这个疤痕了。

sentences.english: Residual effects from these conditions can cause long-term scarring and pock marks.
sentences.chinese: 这些情况的残余后果就是，皮肤长期性的疤痕和痘印。

sentences.english: On admission there was a moderate degree of jaundice and a small scar above the left costal margin.
sentences.chinese: 住院时，在左肋缘上方有中等度黄疸和一个小疤痕。

sentences.english: If it was too big, then it might come off as unlikeable.
sentences.chinese: 要是疤痕太大，就会让观众有不好的印象。
这个疤痕有损于他的容貌。

sentences.english: Do not give children the history of the growth of branded deep a scar?
sentences.chinese: 难道不会给孩子的成长史中深深的烙上一道疤痕？

sentences.english: Thedark turquoise streak visible in the bottom image represents the thescarring left by the tornado.
sentences.chinese: 图像底部看到的暗蓝绿色条纹代表龙卷风留下的疤痕。

sentences.english: Small sugar fragments can set off a signal cascade that increases inflammation and scar formation. A small peptide can block this process and allow scar-free healing
sentences.chinese: 糖碎屑能引发皮肤快速发炎和形成疤痕的显著层叠。

sentences.english: Because the incisions are very small, you will only have small scars on your skin after the procedure.
sentences.chinese: 因为切口非常小，手术后皮肤上只有很小的疤痕。

sentences.english: Then, in an effort to hide the ugly scar, trees were allowed to grow.
sentences.chinese: 然后，为了遮丑疤痕，树木被允许种植。

sentences.english: Objective: To cure bromhidrosis radically add without scars by minute incisions.
sentences.chinese: 目的采用微小切口无疤痕根治腋臭。

definition: to form a scar/to form a scab
trace/impression (e.g. footprint)/abbr. of 印子錢|印子钱[yin4 zi5 qian2], usury
